item.title: Forgotten Voices of Anandur – by John Mueter
item.description: The setting is the fictitious hill station of Anandur in the Palani Hills of Tamil Nadu, South India, the Christian cemetery of the congregation of Saint Andrews. Frederick Osbourne (1901-1923) I was young, brimming with enthusiasm for life, eager for adventure. When my uncle, the District Commissioner, invited me to come out to Madras for a year I embraced the chance. I was enchanted at first by so many exotic sights, sounds and smells –
